---
title: "Asparagus, chilli & feta farfalle"
author: "[Sophie Godwin](https://www.bbcgoodfood.com/recipes/asparagus-chilli-feta-farfalle)"
categories: [pasta]
description: "A summery pasta dish. Alice first cooked this for me."
---

- 200g farfalle pasta
- 2 garlic cloves
- 1 red chilli
- 250g asparagus, cut into small pieces (or broccoli)
- 1 lemon (zested and juiced)
- handful basil leaves
- 30g pine nuts, toasted
- 50g feta

1. Cook pasta for 1 min less than instructions
1. Fry garlic, chilli and a pinch of salt
1. Add the asparagus and lemon zest, and cook for 5 mins until the asparagus is just tender
1. Add pasta to pan with lemon juice and basil. 
1. Top with pine nuts and drizzle of oil
